name: InsidiCORP: Jobholder Productivity Awareness Training
description:
Best in fullscreen.

It is vital that Jobholders complete their daily Jobholder Productivity Awareness Training. Failure to do so will result in a swift and effective stint in the InsidiCORP Correctional Facility. - CCCO Brenda Balustrade

Join the Jobholder's of InsidiCORP featured in the music videos for Hunting Hearts action packed Heartstone Trilogy as the corporate staff come to terms with the escape of the masked fugitives Anybody Else.
